title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 142-2.12 - Learner and apprentice rates
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 142-2.12 - Learner and apprentice rates

State Regulations

No learner or apprentice shall be paid less than the
minimum rate prescribed in this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
142-2.12

Amended

New

York State Register December 28, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 52, eff. 12/31/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
